content: hey ask you something hey Scottie
eight crafters I want to show you this cool little item I found its clicks FX
and it's made by whiz kids and it's for their click bass figures but it worked
with really any miniatures and they have some really cool effects that you can
use for status effects on your role-playing game so let's take a look
at these individually first up we have this kind of smoke shadow space and you
put a guy on it and that's really cool it could be like a spell or something
like that then we have an ice wall so pretty cool that could be literally an
ice wall or some kind of magic pretty sweet and then we have this kind of
energy first thing and we can use that for different spell effects and
recording that on the figure then we have a web so you know that would that's
perfect you know its loft they have giant spiders in our RPGs so someone
gets webbed you can put that on them also we have water effect assassinate
some kind of water spell or water shield or something like that
so very cool and next we have this kind of energy burst this could be like a
holy power or a cleric protection or something like that so pretty neat he's
a really cool and then we have like a wind one so that could even be some kind
of magic wall or magic shield it wouldn't have to be wind I really like
that so these are just excellent really cool and last but not least we have fire
so we can set poor Roderick on fire I'm sure you won't like that very much
but it could be a fire effect or someone on fire so there we go pretty cool
jeez you really think that was a good tip I have so many more Skills than TM
